name: 1inch Staking Reinvest
description: Stakes {{token}} on [1inch DAO](https://app.1inch.io/#/1/dao/governance) to collect governance rewards. Rewards are harvested and deposited back into the strategy.

en.name: 1inch Staking Reinvest
en.description: Stakes {{token}} on [1inch DAO](https://app.1inch.io/#/1/dao/governance) to collect governance rewards. Rewards are harvested and deposited back into the strategy.

fr.name: 1inch Staking Reinvest
fr.description: Stake du {{token}} sur [1inch DAO](https://app.1inch.io/#/1/dao/governance) pour collecter les récompenses issues de la gouvernance. Les récompenses sont récoltées et redéposées dans la stratégie.

es.name: 1inch Staking Reinvest
es.description: Hace staking de {{token}} en [1inch DAO](https://app.1inch.io/#/1/dao/governance) para cobrar recompensas de gobernanza. Las recompensas se cosechan y se vuelven a depositar en la estrategia.

tr.description: {{token}} [1inch DAO](https://app.1inch.io/#/1/dao/governance) adresine yönetim ödüllerini toplamak için stake edilir. Ödüller toplanır ve stratejiye geri yatırılır.

zh.description: 将 {{token}} 存入 [1inch DAO](https://app.1inch.io/#/1/dao/governance) 以领取治理奖励。收获奖励后再进行复投。

hi.name: 1inch Staking Reinvest
hi.description: गवर्नेंस इनाम पाने के लिए {{token}} को [1inch DAO](https://app.1inch.io/#/1/dao/governance) पर दांव पर लगाता है। पुरस्कारों को काटा जाता है और रणनीति में वापस जमा किया जाता है।
